review: We had a 3 night stay to enjoy the all near holi places from Nerchowk, and were very satisfied with every aspect of the hotel Anant. The staff are very friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable regarding places to visit in nearby places. The hotel is very clean throughout, and our room was spacious with everything that we needed. Breakfast was substantial, and suited all tastes. The hotel have very good restaurant, and within easy walking distance from the From Market. We would highly recommend a stay at this hotel.
name: Mukesh

review: It is a very nice hotel perfectly suited for business meetings. Rooms are spacious with very good room service.Food quality is very good and staff do treat the guest very gentle manner.Best part is it's location as It is at the centre of the city.No need to visit anywhere when you are already in Treasure.
name: Apurav kashyap

review: A nice place to be. Warm hospitality and good food are worth mentioning. Clean spacious rooms with amenities make the stay comfortable and relaxing. Very courteous staff deserve a mention. Also open terrace is available with awesome view.
name: Manish gupta

review: Unique property in this area, which describes the beauty of Mandi. I personally prefer to visit ( Hotel Anant ) in all season, If you want special feel in food, hospitality, stay arrangements and courtesy of all staff. Recommending with full marks. I avail the Great Experience with happiness. Thanks to great Minds, who developed this type of unique property in this area......
name: praveen

review: In is very good hotel and location is very excellent and staff is very good food excellent and hotel room excellent and hotel owner Mr. Arun Mahajan very nice person nd service man Mr. Lal singh excellent job my over all stay is very good
name: Suraj
